column4: Ukrainian soldiers repulsed the assaults in the directions Berestove - Ivano-Daryivka and Verkhnyokamyanka - Ivano-Daryivka and forced the invaders to roll back.

description: In Novoluhanske
column4: there are many conflicting reports. Some say Ukraine still holds the entire town

WKT: I do not know how to interpret that situation
name: so for the moment I have labelled the town as contested. Russia is attacking the town (13
